question: When will producers have Pennie account access?
text:
When will producers have Pennie account access? 
          
        
Producers who completed pre-registration and the Pennie training program on-time will begin receiving their accounts in late October, prior to the start of Open Enrollment on November 1. Pennie will send an email with information on how to claim your account and complete account setup. Pre-registered producers should not try to access their account until they have received an email from Pennie with instructions on how to do so.
